CustomField.formula:
IF( !ISBLANK(PrimaryAddressLine1__c), PrimaryAddressLine1__c & ', ', "" ) & IF( !ISBLANK(PrimaryAddressLine2__c), PrimaryAddressLine2__c & ', ', "" ) & IF( !ISBLANK(PrimaryAddressLine3__c), PrimaryAddressLine3__c & ', ', "" ) & IF( (!ISBLANK(PrimaryCity__c)&& !ISBLANK(PrimaryZipCode__c)), PrimaryCity__c &", " & PrimaryZipCode__c & ', ',
IF( (ISBLANK(PrimaryCity__c)&& !ISBLANK(PrimaryZipCode__c)) , PrimaryZipCode__c & ', ',
IF( (!ISBLANK(PrimaryCity__c)&& ISBLANK(PrimaryZipCode__c)) , PrimaryCity__c & ', ', "" ) ) ) & IF( !ISBLANK(PrimaryStateProvince__c), PrimaryStateProvince__c & ', ', "" ) & IF( !ISBLANK(PrimaryCountry__c), PrimaryCountry__c, "" )
CustomField.label: Primary Address Compacted
